      • validateXML

        public static boolean validateXML(java.lang.String dialSpecs,
                  java.lang.String schemaFile)
                           throws DialException
        Validates a XML document containing a specification of a dialogue domain. Returns true if the XML document is valid, false otherwise.
        Parameters:
        dialSpecs - the domain file
        schemaFile - the schema file
        Returns:
        true if document is validated, false otherwise
        Throws:
        DialException - if problem appears when parsing XML
